description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.", "Region_Guarded":
full_summary:
**Victoria-Class Spares – Switch Box Tender**

**Reference Number:** cb-5292-70384099
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-230595/B
**Publication Date:** 2023-05-10
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-09-10T14:00:00
**Amendment Number:** 16
**Amendment Date:** 2024-07-15

The Department of National Defence, Canada is inviting contractors to submit proposals for the procurement of Victoria-Class Spares – Switch Box through a competitive, traditional tendering process.

**Goods and Services:**
- Item 3: Switch Box, GSIN: N5930, NSN: 99-7785634, Part No.: 0J0159001, NCAGE: K0216, quantity: 4 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax.
- Item 4: Switch Box, GSIN: N5930, NSN: 99-7785634, Part No.: 0J0159001, NCAGE: K0216, quantity: 6 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.

**Submission Requirements:**
- Bidders must submit their proposals in English or French, as specified under the Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms.
- Proposals are to be sealed and delivered on or before the closing date to the Contracting Authority.
- The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Attachments and Documents:**
The following attachment(s) are available for download:

- RFP documents: 
    [tender notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_NOTICE/5292/w8482-230595b---rfp-ddp_amd002_1.pdf)
    [Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_NOTICE/18178/w8482-230595b---rfp-ddp_amd006.pdf)
    [Annex A](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_NOTICE/5292/w8482-230595-b--annex-a.pdf)

**Contact Information:**
Please contact the Contracting Authority using the information below:
- Name: Cassandra Leach
- Email: Cassandra.Leach@forces.gc.ca
- Phone Number: (999) 999-9999

Note: All proposals and related documents
